attributes.action: bring forward legislation for directly elected Prime Ministers every 4 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The allowances crisis has shown Parliament to be rotten at the core. We the common people need to raise our voices and call on our representatives in the House of Commons to reform the constitution to include a directly elected PM and a separate parliament that scruitises the work of government. This will ensure that MP's represent the people rather than the whips and the parties they represent. We therefore demand that Parliment is dissolved so that untainted reformist MPs can be elected.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
